courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: Enrollment limited to graduate acting students; concurrent registration in THEA 572, THEA 573 and THEA 574.
description: Intensive professional training in voice and movement skills for the actor. May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: Enrollment limited to graduate acting students; concurrent registration in THEA 572, THEA 573 and THEA 574.
label: Colloquium in Acting: Dynamics
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Graduate - Urbana-Champaign. Restricted to MFA:Theatre (MFA-Acting) -UIUC.
